creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: group of men having a discussion behind an easel at center; to the R, a man addresses a seated woman holding a fan, while another woman looks down at the table next to her; a few other people, paintings, and art supplies in background
marks:
Signature, Mark

on recto in brown at bottom cen signed in plate, lower left: [Gravelot in. et fec.
provenance: Possibly James Hughes Anderdon; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: A Painter's Studio
